import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../Component/Rating'; import data from '../data' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x)=> x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product){ return
Product Not Found
; } return (
